SELECT count(*) FROM log_device_exchange_log as exchange LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment as eqi ON exchange.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON exchange.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_code = bpi.process_code LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bai.factory_code = bfi.factory_code LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON exchange.operator = cur.USER_ID
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_continue_port like '%${equipmentContinuePort}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${operateName}%'
and exchange.exchange_time like '%${exchangeTime}%'

SELECT *, cur.USER_NAME AS operateName FROM log_device_exchange_log as exchange LEFT JOIN eqi_equipment as eqi ON exchange.equipment_int = eqi.equipment_int LEFT JOIN eqi_device AS dev ON exchange.device_id = dev.device_id LEFT JOIN base_access_info AS bai ON eqi.acc_point_res_id = bai.acc_point_res_id LEFT JOIN base_process_info AS bpi ON bai.process_code = bpi.process_code LEFT JOIN base_factory_info AS bfi ON bai.factory_code = bfi.factory_code LEFT JOIN cap_user AS cur ON exchange.operator = cur.USER_ID
and eqi.equipment_id like '%${equipmentId}%'
and eqi.equipment_continue_port like '%${equipmentContinuePort}%'
and bpi.process_name like '%${processName}%'
and cur.USER_NAME like '%${operateName}%'
and exchange.exchange_time like '%${exchangeTime}%'
order by ${field} ${order}
limit ${begin},${limit}
